description: Gets the status of the specified portfolio share operation. This API can only be called by the management account in the organization or by a delegated admin.

parameters.name: PortfolioShareToken
parameters.description: The token for the portfolio share operation. This token is returned either by CreatePortfolioShare or by DeletePortfolioShare.

nested_items.name: PortfolioShareToken
nested_items.description: The token for the portfolio share operation. For example, share-6v24abcdefghi.

nested_items.name: OrganizationNodeValue
nested_items.description: Organization node identifier. It can be either account id, organizational unit id or organization id.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the portfolio share operation.

nested_items.name: ShareDetails
nested_items.description: Information about the portfolio share operation.

nested_items.name: SuccessfulShares
nested_items.description: List of accounts for whom the operation succeeded.

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: List of accounts impacted by the error.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: Error type that happened when processing the operation.
